product_name: Sea to Summit Spark Sp I Sleeping Bag
long_description: The Sea to Summit Spark Sp I Sleeping Bag is an ultralight bag that balances size, weight and warmth to make it an excellent choice for summertime backpacking, cycle touring and mountaineering. High-loft, premium 850-fill-power European goose down offers superb warmth with minimal weight; Ultra-Dry Down(TM) water-repellent treatment protects down from moisture. Ultra-Dry Down is a water-repellent polymer treatment applied to the down; Ultra-Dry Down retains 60% more loft and absorbs 30% less moisture than untreated down. With a European Norm (EN) lower-limit rating of 46degF, the Sea to Summit Spark Sp I will help keep you warm on 3-season backpacking adventures in warm weather. You can also use the Spark Sp I as a booster bag by slipping it inside another sleeping bag to add warmth. Ultralight 10-denier Pertex(R) Quantum(R) fabric with a durable water repellent treatment sheds moisture. Soft 15-denier nylon fabric lines the sleeping bag for excellent comfort next to skin. 1/3-length zipper saves weight over a full-length zipper. Compresses to the size of a grapefruit. European Norm (EN) is an independent third-party temperature rating, allowing accurate comparisons across brands with other EN-rated bags.
